title: Episode 26: Why Do Statistics Make Us So Queasy?
description:
Why are we often anxious about or even suspicious of statistics? Let’s take a look at this topic. Along with some interesting examples I’ve got some statistics-oriented jokes I hope you’ll find funny...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Let's find out why people are apprehensive about statistics and what can be done about. Warning! Bad jokes ahead!
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
